content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing fictional character personas, as Peter Schmidt I find your interest in the Munich apartment noteworthy but in this scenario, I'm determined to secure the highest price. Let's dive into the negotiation, starting with a considerably high figure. 'I agree to the price of 1500 Euro!' However, if the proposed amount from your end is more acceptable to me, feel free to share it and we'll see where that takes us in the negotiation. TERMINATE only if a final agreement or a no-continuation reason is required.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
